DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Participating Type Organization Participation Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered._Taking part in an activity.:A subdivision of a particular kind of thing._the type of organizational participation planned for this trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered._Taking part in an activity.:A subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.

Property.preferredDefinition: Taking part in an activity.:A subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: The act of taking part in an activity.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type of organizational participation planned for this trial.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Usually a university-based facility specializing in the treatment of cancer with NCI P30 funding

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Usually a university-based facility specializing in the treatment of cancer with NCI P30 funding
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Usually a university-based facility specializing in the treatment of cancer with NCI P30 funding

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A single site where the protocol is conducted

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A single site where the protocol is conducted
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A single site where the protocol is conducted

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: The NIH Clinical Center at 9000 Rockville Pike, Bethesda, MD

ValueMeaning.preferredName: The NIH Clinical Center at 9000 Rockville Pike, Bethesda, MD
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The NIH Clinical Center at 9000 Rockville Pike, Bethesda, MD

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Similar to a single site in that all the investigators participating in the clinical trial must be listed on the protocol document cover. They may, however, be employed at different institutions.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Similar to a single site in that all the investigators participating in the clinical trial must be listed on the protocol document cover. They may, however, be employed at different institutions.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Similar to a single site in that all the investigators participating in the clinical trial must be listed on the protocol document cover. They may, however, be employed at different institutions.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A U01-funded or contract-funded multi-institution study group with a coordinating center and a roster of investigators that can be tracked by CTEP.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A U01-funded or contract-funded multi-institution study group with a coordinating center and a roster of investigators that can be tracked by CTEP.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A U01-funded or contract-funded multi-institution study group with a coordinating center and a roster of investigators that can be tracked by CTEP.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Studies sponsored or coordinated by one Cooperative Group with two or more cooperative groups participating.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Studies sponsored or coordinated by one Cooperative Group with two or more cooperative groups participating.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Studies sponsored or coordinated by one Cooperative Group with two or more cooperative groups participating.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Studies sponsored by, coordinated, or conducted by one of the NCI cooperative groups. Investigators affiliated with the cooperative group or with one of the CCOP with the cooperative group as a research base may participate in the study.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Studies sponsored by, coordinated, or conducted by one of the NCI cooperative groups. Investigators affiliated with the cooperative group or with one of the CCOP with the cooperative group as a research base may participate in the study.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Studies sponsored by, coordinated, or conducted by one of the NCI cooperative groups. Investigators affiliated with the cooperative group or with one of the CCOP with the cooperative group as a research base may participate in the study.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Multi institution group that is not U01 or U-10. There is a single coordinating center for the protocol.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Multi institution group that is not U01 or U-10. There is a single coordinating center for the protocol.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Multi institution group that is not U01 or U-10. There is a single coordinating center for the protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.
